TRANSFORMING YOUR
OUTSIDE SPACES

Expert concrete and landscaping services in Bakersfield and surrounding areas. From stunning driveways and patios to custom outdoor kitchens and full landscaping solutions, our team delivers exceptional results. Contact us today for a free estimate!

CONTACT US

Trusted Experts in Concrete and Landscaping

With over 15 years of experience, Rocky Concrete is your trusted partner for high-quality concrete and landscaping services in Bakersfield and surrounding areas. As a family-operated business, we prioritize customer satisfaction, delivering exceptional results in every project. From driveways and patios to custom outdoor kitchens, fire pits, and comprehensive landscaping solutions, our expert team transforms outdoor spaces with precision and care. We offer free estimates and 3D virtual models to help bring your vision to life. Trust Rocky Concrete for beautiful, durable, and functional outdoor spaces.

Services

Concrete Work

Our concrete services include driveways, patios, walkways, and more. We use high-quality materials and skilled craftsmanship to create durable and attractive surfaces.

Landscaping

Our landscaping services include custom design, grass installation, and complete yard transformations. We create stunning outdoor spaces that enhance the beauty and functionality of your property

Outdoor Kitchens

We design and build custom outdoor kitchens perfect for entertaining. Our kitchens feature high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship, including built-in grills, countertops, sinks, and storage.

Fire Pits

Enhance your outdoor space with custom-designed fire pits, perfect for gatherings and relaxation. Built with high-quality materials for safety and longevity, our fire pits complement any outdoor area.

Pool Remodel

Transform your pool area with our comprehensive remodeling services. From updating the pool's surface to enhancing the surrounding landscape, we ensure every detail is perfect.

Additional Services

We offer a variety of other outdoor services to meet all your landscaping and concrete needs, including custom outdoor structures, decorative concrete, and retaining walls.
